June 25, 1949 D Fordingbridge Contest (Section C)
Fordingbridge Contest (Section C) 0 Test Piece Contest
fordingbridge-contest-section-c
None
The Mountain Chief
Fordingbridge, Hampshire March contest - 1st Lockerley, 2nd Broadchalke. Best cornet, trombone and euphonium to Lockerley. 2nd annual contest promoted by Fordingbridge British Legion. 6 bands competed.
Feb. 12, 2014, 1:59 p.m. Feb. 27, 2019, 12:48 p.m.
1 Lockerley Silver Band H. J. Stockwell
2 Burley Silver Sydney Clarke
3 Broad Chalke F. Gurd
